title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 666.8 - Reimbursements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 666.8 - Reimbursements

State Regulations

Reimbursements of actual costs incurred in connection
with joint operations or projects, repairing plant due to damages by others, and obligations to make changes in telecommunications plant (such as highway
relocations), shall be credited to the accounts originally
charged. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
666.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
